name: @modelcontextprotocol/server-pdf
description: MCP server for loading and extracting text from PDF files with chunked pagination and interactive viewer

scripts.build: tsc --noEmit && cross-env INPUT=mcp-app.html vite build && tsc -p tsconfig.server.json && bun build server.ts --outdir dist --target node --external pdfjs-dist && bun build main.ts --outfile dist/index.js --target node --external "./server.js" --external pdfjs-dist --banner "#!/usr/bin/env node"
scripts.start: cross-env NODE_ENV=development npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently 'npm run watch' 'npm run serve'
